summary: This document is an email exchange discussing financial market strategies and ideas shared with individuals at JPMorgan. The sender reflects on the complexities of the financial system and suggests that traditional methods of analysis are no longer effective. The communication also includes a personal note wishing the recipient a happy holiday.

persons.name: Jee
persons.context: Jee is the sender of the email discussing financial market strategies.

persons.name: Jes Stale
persons.context: Jes Stale is the recipient of the email and is mentioned as having shared an idea with the Fed and Jamie that was well-received.

persons.name: Jamie
persons.context: Jamie is mentioned as someone who thought the idea shared by Jes was brilliant.

persons.name: JP Morgan
persons.context: JP Morgan is referenced in a historical context regarding his yacht during the depression.

keyFacts: The email discusses the complexities of the financial markets and suggests that traditional methods of analysis are outdated.
Jee wishes Jes Stale a happy holiday and mentions giving Lesley some time over the weekend.
Jes Stale shared an idea with the Fed and Jamie that was considered brilliant.
JP Morgan is referenced in relation to his yacht, the Corsair, built during the Great Depression.
